 gil I'll recall your past.Your stories of love, anger, triumph, and shame,The river of memories runs deep and vast.

1�The leaves of this plant are  �[bulky/thin/bulky] and its fruit is covered with a  �[hard/hard/soft] shell.
1�Pluck the fruit?Yes.No.
1�The leaves of this plant are  �[bulky/thin/bulky] and its fruit is covered with a  �[hard/hard/soft] shell.
1�Pluck the fruit?Yes.No.
1�The leaves of this plant are  �[bulky/thin/bulky] and its fruit is covered with a  �[hard/hard/soft] shell.
1�Pluck the fruit?Yes.No.
1�Stop!
1�Take a look. The fertilizer I used has created such succulent bounty.
1�At the very least, wait until they are fully ripe!
1�The plants might give birth to monsters? You're...you're serious, aren't you?
1�But then all my work...
1�By the Goddess!
o!�I told you! Get back!
1�I-I think so.
!!�Erisa, are you okay?
1�I wonder if these monsters were really trying to attack us.
1�Well, when Erisa tried to stop it, it backed down as if it were listening to her...
1�Y-yes, of course.
1�Pardon my brashness, but, um...would it be possible for you to bring these to Erisa for me?
1�They're some seeds I came across in the forest.
1�Oh, there's no need for worry. They are just seeds of the first plants that she ever grew.
1�I know that this experiment took a bad turn, but not knowing what might occur is precisely why her research is necessary.
1�I don't want her to give up her studies.
1�I'll be right there!
1�Thank you for doing this.
1�That's why I told you to give us the plants. You were lucky things didn't turn out worse.
1�Kyff, are you out of your mind? You saw what they did just now!
1�Now I'm certain there's something wrong with you. Since when can monsters understand language? Now get back to cleaning this place up!
1�Kyff! Stop blabbering and get over here!
1�Did you manage to catch the raptors yet?
1�You too? You wouldn't think something so large could be so nimble.
1�How could that guy manage to catch one...?
1�Who's there? What are you doing with that raptor? They're meant to be ??taken care of??!
1�Ilney! I told you to lay low!
1�So that's how you did it...
1�Y-you tricked us! You never had any intention of cooperating, did you?
1�A-as if I'd ever join your useless coalition! It's only fit for pranksters and miscreants!
1�I-I was just...
1�Maester Gratzigg!
1�Maester, f-forgive...
1�Using a trap, of course.
1�Who do you think it is?
1�What do you expect me to do, seeing you bumbling around? As soon as it's captured, I'm outta here.
1�A simple matter, really. I used the rockberries to lure them in, and they were like putty in my hands.
1�That raptor you captured earlier? He let himself get caught to protect this one. It almost moved me to tears.
1�Have a look. If I give this one a few good whacks, the other one will come rushing in to protect him.
1�What did I tell you?
1�Aren't you...the ?[guy/lady] who came to my house before?
1�Hmph. I would have gotten away with it if it wasn't for you meddling mummers.
1�You appear to have recovered splendidly from your wounds, Ilney.
1�Caught in the act, indeed. When I went to go see Vorahal, I tinkered with his cage.
1�What goes around comes around. You put on such a stellar performance that I should invite you to join with the Mummers!
1�Miscreants, you say?
1�The way I see it, the only miscreants here are the ones who brought some trumped-up charges against innocent raptors!
1�Look who descends from the heavens just when his lackeys need him most. You wouldn't happen to know anything about this raptor incident, would you, Gratzigg?
1�Amiss, indeed. The raptors breaking free, attacking innocents--evidently your people were involved in this sham of an operation!
1�Accept your apologies? Well, that depends. I'm sure the Scouts' Coalition would love to get wind of such a farcical scheme!
1�Well...I suppose I can forgive you.
1�Well, well, those foot soldiers aren't the only ones capable of putting on a good show.
1�Didn't you notice it?
1�Gratzigg's words may have been pretty, but I know better.
1�He'll do whatever it takes to stop pioneers from exploring the lands.
1�And that man named Ilney--I'm almost certain he reports to the Ulbuka Wardens.
1�Have you never heard of them? They are staunchly opposed to what we are doing in Ulbuka. It does not surprise me in the least that they would be in league with the Peacekeepers.
1�But enough political lessons for today. We have got fights to plan!
1�Would you mind going back to Pagnelle and telling her the raptors are safe and accounted for?
1�You've seen for yourself what a worrywart she is. She'll be waiting for good news.

1�I don't need to tell you that raptor fights are one-on-one competitions between two raptors. Predictably, the raptor that successfully makes its way through the brackets to the end is declared the champion.
1�Still, a good deal root for another competitor--Tenacious Tirrod--as a bit of a guilty pleasure.
1�He's an underdog to be sure, having no trophies to his name, but his never-say-die attitude has won the hearts of his supporters.
1�Ladies and Gentlemen!
1�The Mummers' Coalition is proud to present to you...the famous, the one and only...raptor fights!
1�Our first bout today features two of our most imposing specimens.
1�In the right corner, with a body hard as mythril, it's Fearless Fismar!
1�And in the left corner, the indomitable scourge of Ulbuka, Tenacious Tirrod!
1�Only the victor will be eligible to move on to the next round, folks. Which will light the flames of conquest? Which will dive into the depths of obscurity?
1�And now, our final event of the day!
1�You know him, you love him, and above all you fear him, the undisputed champion of the ring...Vicious Vorahal!
1�Who among us could fathom that Tirrod would survive to face Vorahal in the arena!?
1�Will he be able to claim the crown for the first time in his career?
1�Or will he fall, like so many before him?
1�The decisive bout is about to get underway, folks!
!?�Wait--Vorahal is preparing for--could it be--his famed special attack!?
d!�And...
1�And we have a winner! Vicious Vorahal successfully defends his crown!!!
1�But Tenacious Tirrod put on quite the impressive performance! Come on, everyone, let's give our competitors a huge round of applause!
